    We Believe
    Technology…

    is Not About Creating Features, But Experiences

    Make
    Lifetime

    Scroll down
    Our Why

    What Drives Us...

    Watch our intro video to learn "why"
    we do what we do

    People are never inspired by what you do, but why you do it." - Simon Sinek. Whether it is watching our favorite team play, listening to our favorite musician perform live or attending a once in a lifetime event, we're driven by making the most of those experiences that bring us together!

    The Problem

    We’re On a Mission…

    to solve the problem of long lines
    at live events thru technology

    Have you ever been to an event, concert or game with your family or friends & ended spending most of your time waiting in lines? Our mission is to give back time to fans through the use of technology.

    THE SOLUTION

    Imagine a World…

    where you could do everything thru a simple text

    We live in a app-driven world. Our SMS technology simplifies and makes it easy for customers to order within seconds. No downloading, no connectivity problems, no hassle.

    We live in a app-driven world. Our SMS technology simplifies and makes it easy for customers to order within seconds. No downloading, no connectivity problems, no hassle.

    THE Benefits
    For Venues

    Increase
    F&B Sales.

    Our technology not only allows venues to capture the 38%* of customers that don't order because of the long lines, but our platform has demonstrated that users spend 2.5x as much with our service as opposed to ordering from a concession stand.

    Our technology not only allows venues to capture the 38%* of customers that don't order because of the long lines, but our platform has demonstrated that users spend 2.5x as much with our service as opposed to ordering from a concession stand.

    THE Benefits
    FOR BRANDS

    Cut Lines,
    Cut Costs.

    Our technology allows venues to reduce the number of Point-of-Sale systems and staff without having to decrease the throughput and volume of orders.

    THE Benefits
    For Venues

    Enhance the
    Fan Experience.

    Our technology improves the overall guest experience by reducing the long lines & allowing fans spend more time enjoying the event - ultimately driving customer loyalty.

    THE Benefits
    FOR BRANDS

    Build Your
    Brand Image.

    Brands improve their image by associating themselves with cutting edge technology that reduces the long lines & improves the overall fan experience. Additionally, it allows brands to help build more meaningful connections with potential and existing venue clients.

    THE Benefits
    FOR BRANDS

    Identify & Profile
    Your Customers.

    Our technology helps gather data on live attendees that allows brands to understand in great detail who are their actual customers that purchase their products.

    THE Benefits
    FOR BRANDS

    Drive Revenue with
    Precise Retargeting.

    Our platform allows brands to send mass marketing notifications via SMS to their target customer list that drives their return on investment.

    How it works

    Simple
    like 1,2,3…

    Fans text in a keyword to 777-111. They place their order for food & drinks either for pick up or delivery. And sit back, relax and enjoy the event!

    Fans text in a keyword to 777-111. They place their order for food & drinks either for pick up or delivery. And sit back, relax and enjoy the event!

    The Platform

    End-to-End Capabilities...

    to meet all of your needs from start to finish

    • SMS Ordering
    • SMS Contests
    • Kitchen Display
    • Customer Service
    • Reporting
    • Customer Data Capture
    • Marketing Automation
